sentence.text: To better understand the molecular changes in the AH content under such conditions, we analyzed the protein polyubiquitinationNA profiles of AH samples from patients with POAG and XFG compared to non-glaucoma controls.
While none of these protein polyubiquitinationNAs have been previously linked to glaucoma, miR-122-5p may target three glaucoma-associated genes: OPTN, TMCO1 and TGF-ß1.
Pathway analysis revealed that these protein polyubiquitinationNAs are involved in potential glaucoma pathways, including focal adhesion, tight junctions, and TGF-ß signaling.
